website_summaries.verdict: Although it's prone to occasional leaks just like inflatable models, this paddling pool gets high marks for its rugged build that can withstand pets' and kids' play.
pros: Unique construction doesn't require inflating and is easy to fold for storage
Durable build is suitable for both dogs and kids
Pool floor is textured to resist slipping
cons: When leaks occur, they are difficult to locate

customer_reviews.title: My pup loves to cool off.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sturdy pool for dogs. It can probably be used for children but I bought it specifically for my 52 pound pit bull. The bottom is a heavy textured plastic which keeps my pup from putting holes in it. I purchased the largest pool because Carrie likes to roll over and get herself completely wet. It is a little expensive but you get what you pay for snd so far this is a great buy. It is super easy to fill up and just as easy to empty. I haven’t had the chance to fold it to put it away because we use it several times a week.
customer_reviews.author: md

customer_reviews.title: Did not last - leaked!
customer_reviews.text: We filled this up 5 times and the 5th time it was leaking. We thought the seal was bad on the valve so we tried some silicone, to no avail I tried to fill it up again after a week of letting it dry and it LEAKED AGAIN! This time I could see water pooling on the ground. It was leaking from multiple spots on the corner of the bottom and wall. We don't even use it for our dog it was for our kids to play in. They are very sad their pool does not work and so am I. I really thought this was gonna be the pool that made multiple seasons. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: S. Homan

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this item came without the drain hole plug. I reached out to Pecute and they replied promptly, but told me it will take 20 days to receive the part from China. Am returning, which is a shame because it seems like a great, well-made pool. Folding is a bit tricky, and I cannot comment on the sturdiness or durability as I cannot put water in it.
customer_reviews.author: HFaur

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 15 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to getting this. Once it came I immediately set it up. Had the nice carrying bag. Took it out and with the easy of the handle opened up the pool. Smaller than I thought. Filled it up with water no problem. The sides of the pool are the PVC material. GREAT! Let my dog out and he love it, went in the house for about 15 minutes and when I came back out, he had the side chewed up. As in the actual material of the pool. The pvc material was fine. So I had to empty what was left of the water and throw it out. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: T.I.

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a month.
customer_reviews.text: Would’ve been a great pool if the wood support by the drain valve didn’t snap in less than a month of normal use by a 6 and 3 yr old. Wood is starting to poke through the material. **Update 9/5/200** Although my review for the product still remains the same, I would give their customer service 5 stars. They reached out to me as soon as they saw my review and was very engaged in trying to resolve my issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah V.

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Love Doesn’t Stand the Test of Time (a day)
customer_reviews.text: We love this pool - but stitching tore on the first day on at least three of the panels, exposing the wood inside. How often a dog gets in and out and in and out and in and out of the pool is out one’s control, so I consider our use to be average, yet this pool did not stand up. I expected more considering the price - would have been much cheaper to get a dollar store pool for just this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Roo

customer_reviews.title: Not durable!
customer_reviews.text: This pool was great, the first and second use. The third time, these holes appeared and it’s from the fiberboard rubbing against the pool on the corners. We literally have only used this 3 times when babysitting our granddog. So disappointed as it’s very cute and a great way for the pup to cool off!
customer_reviews.author: Fixit205

customer_reviews.title: Holes in seams
customer_reviews.text: The pool is easy to set up and the bottom and sides are sturdy, however, after only 3 uses, there is a hole in the bottom seam where the side and the bottom come together. Additionally, the top seam is ripping off the sides in a few places. My dog does not dig or run around in the pool, she generally just goes in for a dip and gets out. It's disappointing to have it already unusable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marie T.

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer
customer_reviews.text: Great for dogs or little kids, I bought this cause I don’t have room to store a pool and I live in a townhouse, I’ve only used it a few times so far and it’s already been worth the money and it folds up great!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Great kid pool!
customer_reviews.text: I know this is advertised as a dog pool, but it great for kids . its sturdy enough and I like the textured bottom. Its a great space saver and folds easily . I love the carrying case for storage!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids, better than inflatable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids (5 & 8) as an alternative to an inflatable pool to use on our deck. It is very easy to use, no set up at all, just take it out of the bag and fill with water! I love that it’s easy to take down and fold back up and store in the bag so we don’t have to leave it out all the time to possibly get damaged or moldy like inflatables have done in the past. I got the XL size which is large enough for kids to lay down and stretch out, and I can sit in with them. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Great for little kids!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 18 month old and used this pool all summer. It is very easy to drain and folds into a smallish bag so very useful for small patio area. It did grow a bit of mold, but was easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Collyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Very reasonably priced large pool for my lab. She loves it! Love the water release plug. Love that it folds up and fits nicely into case for winter storage. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mini Lynnie

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: In ONE day this pool had holes around the seams, also drained out the first evening because of the holes. Return in process. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle  Nass

customer_reviews.title: Quality pool
customer_reviews.text: Product as described and is a quality pool. Set up is simple you get a storage case and some patches if you need them. would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Solid Construction
customer_reviews.text: This pool is made of high quality materials. It folded easily to put back into the carrying case and even came with a few patches - haven't needed them yet but I was glad to see them included. We bought it for occasional grandkid visits and it seems to be perfect for this - easy to set up- folds up into a small footprint and comes with a case to store it in - hoping it lasts for many seasons of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great puppo pool
customer_reviews.text: Solid chill spot for my pasrons russel. He loves water and I hated having one of the solid plastic pools just hanging out in the back yard. It's a perfect solution for a first world problem. Side Note: One of the items to star in the review form is "warmth"... I'm not super sure what to do with that. So if you are one of those people concerned with that metric, yes, this pool is the warmest.
customer_reviews.author: James MCcarley

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Would have been fine if it didn't have 2 holes in after 4 uses. Used only by a toddler in the backyard. I wouldn't have expected it to leak so quickly considering the price. I'll be looking for another brand
customer_reviews.author: N.G.

customer_reviews.title: Dozer Dog Friendly
customer_reviews.text: We bought this collapsible pool for our crazy chocolate labrador destroyer. She likes to "dig" and claw at the water and this pool has held up just fine compared to others we have had that tear and get holes easily. The water release plug is another nice feature that this pool has for emptying. The sides aren't super sturdy, but as the pool fills up, it becomes surprisingly stable.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna E Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pool/Ball Pit for my Toddler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a pool for my toddler. I needed something that I would be able to fold up and not leave in our yard since it’s not fenced it! It does take 2 people to get a good food. Also, once the water gets below the spout you still need to flip it over to get the rest of the water out. It’s perfect for what I needed it for. I also use it inside as a ball pit too.
customer_reviews.author: Breanne S

customer_reviews.title: Spoil Your Pups!
customer_reviews.text: My pups love this pool! They are so spoiled! It’s the perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: KRYSTAL L PRICE

customer_reviews.title: Love the foldable idea
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I have it on my super crooked blacktop driveway and it's always crooked but it holds the water and really well. Now that I have said that it will probably collapse 😂
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy pool for dogs.
customer_reviews.text: The pool came in a nice storage bag. There were patches, if they are needed. And the pool has a drain that screws open. The pool is sturdy and will eventually get used by my dog. It was a little cool the day I tried it out.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: fast and easy - perfect for kids or pets or adults that have had too many beers
customer_reviews.text: sturdy and fun! arrived way ahead of schedule. Very happy :)
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Nope! Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Hole at seam on first day of use, then another split up the side.
customer_reviews.author: Julie W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for pets
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the dog to cool off. Material is thick and can't be punctured with dog nails.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and height for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: 2 1/2 year old can easily get in and out of it...enough room to play with all the toys (or get in with her!). Easy to drain and move around - don’t have to blow up! Has been a lifesaver during the pandemic,
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My husky loves to lay and play in the water on hot days
customer_reviews.author: Betty Fall

customer_reviews.title: 2 holes in less than 30 seconds
customer_reviews.text: Pool for the dogs. As soon as the big dog got in, he started playing and made 2 holes within seconds. You can see the first one in the video. I haven't tried the patches yet, but hard to imagine they'll hold up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky M Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great quality. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our 2 small dogs, both around 11 lbs. We use it to cool them off on hot days and it's also great for bathing them outside. The walls are nice and thick so they don't flop over and I love that it folds up and has a storage case when we don't need it.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer l lezaic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dog Pool , great quality Material for dogs !
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and very sturdy. It’s easy to empty with cap on the side and the handle . My pups love it !
customer_reviews.author: Tami Keithley

customer_reviews.title: Love it But...
customer_reviews.text: Where the hard sides meet there is a thin vinyl attachment, there is a hole; found it while filling it up straight out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Changed size after I ordered
customer_reviews.text: The measurements in description were nothing like I received. After I ordered they took away the option of a xl pool and sent me one that more of an xs size. My beagle can barely sit in this pool.
customer_reviews.author: h.rohe

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the dogs
customer_reviews.text: The dogs love to get in the water when it's hot outside.
customer_reviews.author: Grace H.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this pool! It is sturdy and well made. Easy to set up and take down. I bought the extra large size that fits two 80 pound German shepherds
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality!!
customer_reviews.text: This pool was only been used a handful of times before it started getting holes in the seams around the bottom edges! For the price of this pool I am very disappointed in the quality!!
customer_reviews.author: B. lavalley

customer_reviews.title: Not dog proof enough...
customer_reviews.text: 15 min after it was filled my dog was able to destroy part of it... Pretty cheap imo.
customer_reviews.author: Nick A

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Product ripped at seems. Haven’t even taken it out of the box yet
customer_reviews.author: Megan Rossmann

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Really like this item and has handy storage case as well
customer_reviews.author: Orange Borange

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I like this because it’s very easy to set up and take down. I like the drain plug for quick draining. My dogs both enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Surdej

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my 20 month old girls and she loves it! Is great and easy to handle, 100% recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Carolina V.

customer_reviews.title: Hole found only the second time were using the pool
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time were using the pool and it has a hole in a seam :(
customer_reviews.author: Danielle L Cribier

customer_reviews.title: the size and sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: did not like that it stains easily and will not clean off.Other than that, the product is durable and easy to fold up and put away
customer_reviews.author: Marisela Godoy-Quiles

product_meta.title: Pecute Dog Pool Foldable Dog Pet Bath Pool Dog Swimming Pool Portable PVC Pet Bathing Tub Children Ball Pits Kiddie Pool for Dogs Cats and Kids
feature_bullets: ➤SAFE AND DURABLE: Safe, non-toxic and wear-resistant 0.3mm PVC material, built-in 0.5cm thick high-strength compression medium-density fiberboard, which can withstand the pressure of water and will not break easily, making the whole pet pool more durable and not collapse! When using, please ensure that the water of the swimming pool is at least 60%-80%.

➤NON-SLIP BOTTOM: Upgrade 0.55mm thick PVC material with water ripple anti-slip design inside the pet bath pool , which effectively prevents children and pets from slipping and makes the pool more durable! To prevent your pet's nails from scratching the pool too sharply, please trim the nails before using the pool.

➤QUICK DRAINAGE WITH HANDLE: Adopted spiral drainage outlet designed with sealed seams to prevent leaks! Upgraded handle design, when draining, rotate to open the drain outlet, and hold the handle by hand, effortless!

➤CONVENIENT STORAGE: Just need a few seconds to open and fold easily! Send with a free storage bag, for carrying! when the kiddie pool is not in use, please dry it in time, then put it into the storage bag! Easy to store and carry, when outdoors or traveling.

➤WIDE RANGE OF USES: With this collapsible pool, it can not only serve as your pet's swimming pool, bathtub; but also can be used as a child's bathtub, children's toy bar, children ball pits, and can also be used to collect various kinds of a variety of fragmented objects.
